publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6836.1 Bill Kidd: Bruce Festival 2010—As an amendment to motion (S3M-6836) in the name of Murdo Fraser, after first "Robert the Bruce’" insert ", in particular his leadership, which resulted in 1314 in the recognition of Scotland as an independent nation". Supported by: Alasdair Allan*, Rob Gibson*, Christine Grahame*, Dave Thompson*, Bill Wilson*, Brian Adam*, Aileen Campbell*, Kenneth Gibson*, Christina McKelvie*, Angela Constance*, Stuart McMillan* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
